heading: HB01546
0: AN ACT CONVERTING THE CANDAWAGA NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL - PANALINGAAN EXTENSION IN BARANGAY PANALINGAAN, MUNICIPALITY OF RIZAL, PROVINCE OF PALAWAN, INTO A SEPARATE AND DISTINCT NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL FROM THE CANDAWAGA NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL, TO BE KNOWN AS PANALINGAAN NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
